H0.text: Who was known as 'The Great One' in North American ice hockey. Bobby Orr

H1.text: Who was known as 'The Great One' in North American ice hockey. Mario Lemieux

H2.text: Who was known as 'The Great One' in North American ice hockey. Gordie Howe

H3.text: Who was known as 'The Great One' in North American ice hockey. Gretzky

A4.text: nicknamed 'the Great One', he has been called the greatest ice hockey player ever by the NHL based on surveys of hockey writers, ex-players, general managers and coaches.
